[SSDVirt](http://www.ssdvirt.com) - SSD VPS Hosting

**About Us**
SSDVirt was founded to provide high performance VPS hosting at affordable prices. We value our loyal customers and strive to provide the best service to them by never sacrificing quality or performance. SSDVirt is part of Garrison Network Solutions LLC, a Texas based LLC founded in 2010.

**VPS Node Specifications**
Intel E3 1230 or better
16GB DDR3 ECC RAM
Samsung 830 SSDs
LSI 6Gbps Hardware Raid with BBU
1Gbps Port
New York Datacenter

**KVM 256MB** - $6/month with coupon code LET25
» RAM: 256 MB
» SSD Storage: 3 GB
» CPU Cores: 1 Core
» Transfer: 250 GB
» Port Speed: 1Gbps
**[[Order Now]](https://clients.ssdvirt.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)**

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to [contact us](http://clients.ssdvirt.com/contact.php).
